sections.title: Verse 1
content: Sing of Mary, pure and lowly,
Virgin Mother undefiled.
Sing of God's own most holy Child,
Who became her little child.
Fairest Child of fairest Mother,
God the Lord who came to earth,
Word made flesh, our very brother,
Takes our nature by His birth.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Sing of Jesus, Son of Mary,
In the home at Nazareth.
Toil and labor cannot weary
Love enduring unto death.
Constant was the love He gave her,
Through He went forth from her side,
Forth to preach and heal and suffer,
Till on Calvary He died.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Joyful Mother, full of gladness,
In your arms Your Lord was borne.
Mournful Mother, full of sadness,
All your heart with pain was torn.
Glorious Mother now rewarded,
With a crown at Jesus' hand,
Age to age Your name recorded,
Shall be blest in every land.

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Glory be to God the Father;
Glory be to God the Son;
Glory be to God the Spirit;
Glory to the Three in One.
From the heart of blessed Mary,
From all saints the song ascends,
And the Church the strain reechoes,
Unto earth's remotest ends.
